title: KSI vs Logan Paul UK press conference: Date, what time, stream online, where is it and how to buy tickets
text:
KSI and Logan Paul are set to fight again: Getty

KSI and Logan Paul will meet once more before fight week, this time in London for a press conference.

A decision to host a press conference in the UK was made after high demand from fans, with the initial decision to not host one overturned.

Scroll to continue with content Ad

The first, in Los Angeles, California, was bizarre. Insults were traded as promoter and head of Matchroom Boxing USA Eddie Hearn admitted it was a ‘circus’ he ‘needed to stop from becoming a complete circus’.

While it’s expected that the fight will be the most watched and subscribed to in DAZN’s history, it has drawn controversy for staging two fighters who have never had a professional fight in their lives as the main event.

Here’s what you need to know about the press conference.

What day is it?

It’s on Monday, 7th October. Not long at all then!

What time is it?

It will be at 6pm UK time, so those who have work or school will have plenty of time to get there!

Where is it?

It’s at the infamous music venue Troxy, 490 Commercial Road, Limehouse, London.

Read more

Eddie Hearn reveals plans for next Jake Paul fight

Can I attend?

You absolutely can, and you'll need to get a ticket because of 'huge demand'. It will be free to attend, so act fast.

How do I watch online?

It will be streamed in the same way as before, on both fighters’ YouTube channels. All for free.
